caption.title: 21 st century trends in E 0 across the different E 0 formulations.
caption.p: Trends in MJJAS E 0 projected from Penman-Monteith (green), Hargreaves-Samani (blue), and Priestley-Taylor (red) formulations driven by GFDL-ESM2M and CanESM2 data for the Northern Great Plains. The top row shows seasonal totals in mm, center row shows E 0 anomalies as % of the 1976â€“2005 mean, and bottom row shows standardized E 0 anomalies.
